{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|regex}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|
regex_error( std::regex_constants::error_type ecode );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|
regex_error( const regex_error&amp; other );
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Constructs a {{tt|regex_error}} with a given {{c|ecode}} of type {{lc|std::regex_constants::error_type}}.

@2@ Copy constructor. Initializes the contents with those of {{c|other}}. If {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}} both have dynamic type {{tt|std::regex_error}} then {{c|1=std::strcmp(what(), other.what()) == 0}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ecode|error code indicating the error raised in regular expression parsing}}
{{par|other|another {{tt|regex_error}} object to copy}}
{{par end}}
